title: Competency-Based Onboarding Program for Clinical Research Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for clinical research participant enrollment, regulatory compliance coordination, and research documentation management

learning_goals: Learners can complete eight or more modules related to core clinical research competencies (regulatory compliance, data management, participant management) within 90 days
Learners can perform three practical tasks applying real research protocols through collaboration with mentors/managers
Learners can achieve over 85% competency attainment using an LMS-based self-assessment tool
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
